name: James Ng
title: Team Coach & Operations Partner
bio: James builds trauma-sensitive coaching containers for bilingual product and operations teams navigating growth.
He brings a decade of experience leading analytics, people operations, and risk reviews across Southeast Asia.
Clients appreciate how he holds calm structure while translating technical context for non-technical leaders.
focus: Coaching operations leads through cross-border scale-up
Designing data care agreements between product, policy, and legal teams
Supporting managers who hold both people leadership and caregiving responsibilities
credentials: Former Head of Operations at a climate-tech startup
